attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the scanadlous reply of shrugged shoulders against the 1.79 million people who petitioned about road pricing, this has led a lot of people into having no confidence at all in the government. 
this petition is for the PM Mr Tony Blair to resign due to the undersigned persons lack of confidence in his ability to run this country, and listen to a word his public says.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
